meanings.definition: Use or exploit (something) less than its full potential.
meanings.sent1: She was underutilizing her skills by not taking on more challenging projects.
meanings.sent2: The company was underutilizing its resources by not investing in new technology.
meanings.sent3: The chef was underutilizing the flavorful spices in the kitchen cupboard.
meanings.sent4: The athlete felt like he was underutilizing his speed on the short track.
meanings.sent5: The student realized she was underutilizing her study time by getting distracted easily.

meanings.definition: Fail to make full use of (something).
meanings.sent1: He knew he was underutilizing his potential by not pursuing his passion for music.
meanings.sent2: The team was underutilizing their chances of winning by not practicing regularly.
meanings.sent3: The gardener was underutilizing the fertile soil in the backyard garden.
meanings.sent4: The artist felt like she was underutilizing her creativity by sticking to one style.
meanings.sent5: The manager realized he was underutilizing his team's talents by not delegating tasks effectively.
